OAretMVPARTcov<-
  datMVPAcongIncongRTOA %>%                      #Create table named OAretMVPARTcov
  group_by(ROI) %>%                                 #Within each ROI,
  summarise(pval = list(tidy(t.test(congTargvIncongTargclassAcc, mu=.5))),  #Perform a 1s t-test against chance, 
            sdClassAcc = sd(congTargvIncongTargclassAcc)) %>%               #Then take sd of classifier acc,
  unnest() %>%                                      #Turn list to column,
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 3)) %>%           #Round variables to the fourth decimal, and
  select(1:9)                                  
#Manually rename columns for ease of readability
names(OAretMVPARTcov)[3] <- \avgClassAcc\"
